name: Rakesh M. Verma
content: University of Houston Home Courses For Students Research Interests Professional Service Rakesh M. Verma Professor of Computer Science Director of ReDAS Lab Ph. D. (Computer Science, SUNY at Stony Brook) M. S. (Computer Science, SUNY at Stony Brook) B. Tech. (Hons., Gold Medal) (Electronics & Electrical Comm. Engg., Indian Institute of Technology (Varanasi)) CV ★ PC Co-Chair of ACM CODASPY April 2021 and 2022 (virtual) ★ Cybersecurity Analytics book published Nov, 2019" Book webpage (More Info, Datasets, etc.) ★ ACM SIGCSE 2021 Poster on Cybersecurity Capacity Expansion ★ ACM SIGCSE 2021 BOF Session on Security ★ Digital Story based on SFS/S-STEM grants ★ 6th ACM International Workshop on Security and Privacy Analytics (IWSPA 2020), colocated with ACM CODASPY 2020, 18 March 2020 ★ Scholarships for US citizens/permanent residents interested in graduate studies in Cybersecurity ★ Pictures and Videos! ★ Check out: Center for Information Assurance Research and Education ★ Check out: Our Web Site for the NSF-supported Capacity Expansion Project 2015 News Flash: UH is a Center of Academic Excellence in IA/CD Research AND Education!
